text: Allahâ€Œi tini yini bayuprabaha pathana. Tarapara tara megha sancara kare, takhana tini yemana iccha karena ta chariye dena akasera madhye, tarapara eke tini tukaro tukaro karena, phale tomara dekhate pa'o tara nice theke brsti beriye asache, atahpara yakhana tini ta parate dena tamra bandadera yake tini iccha karena tara upare, dekho! Tara ullasa kare
